pageContext.claim: “One of the greatest and most powerful weapons used by the Fake and Corrupt News Media is the phony Polling Information they put out. Many of these polls are fixed, or worked in such a way that a certain candidate will look good or bad. Internal polling looks great, the best ever!”
pageContext.analysis: There are polls that tend to be more accurate and less accurate. The polling gurus at FiveThirtyEight rank them accordingly, but they are not a “weapon” used by mainstream media to provide false information.
